name: The Panel Remake
description:
The Panel Remake is a puzzle game where you will turn valves, pull levers and push buttons.

It's an escape room game, where you interact with a panel, complete puzzles and make your way to the exit.

Start interacting with the panel elements and find the combinations. So maybe, if you discover how that panel works, you will be able to make it out.

FEATURES
  • 18 puzzles to discover
  • Available on Windows and Linux(Still working on a Mac build)
